name: break_tackle
description: Once per turn may use str instead of agility to dodge

name: grab
description: Can a move the enemy when hit to any free cell

name: juggernaut
description: both down = push, no fend, stand firm nor wrestle

name: multiple_block
description: can hit to any adjacent at once, but they have +2 str

name: pilling_on
description: prone to repeat injury or armor check
